rules.summary: rs1142345 in TPMT is one of the variants used in clinical pharmacogenomic assessment of thiopurine metabolism.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for rs1142345.
suggestion: If you take thiopurines (e.g., azathioprine, mercaptopurine), discuss pharmacogenomic testing with a clinician. Do not change medications based on this app.

evidence_level.summary: CPIC guidelines exist for TPMT and thiopurines.

limitations: Single-SNP results are not sufficient for clinical decisions. This is not a clinical test or dosing advice.
references: CPIC guidelines for TPMT and thiopurines (PharmGKB/CPIC)
